name: Cavespooks
description:
A game where you have to escape a monster while controlling your mind, your heart and the air in your lungs. 

Tutorial ( i didn't manage to put one in-game )

Your Objective is to escape the monster by going to the right side of the screen.

On the upper right side of the screen you got 3 buttons:

Start to Run - Makes your character run to the right side of the screen, can be toggled to make him stop.

Consume food - For the price of one item you can add some air in your lungs. 

Leave Bag -  If you have at least 1 item in your bag, you can use this button. It will make your character have a giant speed boost ( if he is running, of course )

Also on the right side, you can see some of the status of your character, being them:

The Air in your lungs - The bar represents how many air is still left in your lungs, if it reaches 0% you need to stop to rest. 

The BPM of your heart - The closer you are to the monster, the greater this number will be, if you somehow manage to get 165 bpm, your speed will increase when you run for a limited time, but also, will make your Air bar decrease severelly. 

The Sanity bars that you still have - The lesser you have, the faster the monster will be, they decrease one bar every 20 seconds.

The Bag - It shows how many items you still have left to use
